name: Frogger - Grab the Flies!
description:
Main features

  • Avoid the cars
  • Leap over  logs
  • Watch out your hunger bar
  • And grab all those flies
  • Through 4 epic levels!

Movement

Frog's controls: ASDW

Description

This is a learning proyect made by a game design student for a University subject.

Any feedback is welcome!

Enjoy it! :)
